Package com.mygdx.game

Class GameScreen

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
com.mygdx.game.GameScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
Direct Known Subclasses:
AgilityTestScreen, EndScreen, GameBoard, HighScoreScreen, InstructorDashboardScreen, KnowledgeListScreen, MainMenuScreen, ManageStudentsScreen, NewGameScreen, PauseScreen, SaveScreen, ShopScreen, TutorialScreen
public class GameScreen extends com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
Parent class contains attributes and methods common to all gameplay screens.
Author:
Franck Limtung (flimtung)

    • GameScreen

      public GameScreen(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch, com.badlogic.gdx.assets.AssetManager assets)
      Constructor initializes the game screen.
      Parameters:
      batch - SpriteBatch to initialize the Stage with
      assets - AssetManager to load assets with

  • Method Details

    • show

      public void show()
      Runs immediately when the active screen is changed to this. By default, it will just set LibGDX's InputProcessor to this screen's Stage. It should be overridden by child classes if they need to perform additional functions.
      Specified by:
      show in interface com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
      Overrides:
      show in class com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter

    • render

      public void render(float delta)
      Runs every frame. It should be overridden by child classes if they need to perform additional functions.
      Specified by:
      render in interface com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
      Overrides:
      render in class com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
      Parameters:
      delta - The time in seconds since the last render.

    • resize

      public void resize(int width, int height)
      Resizes the screen.
      Specified by:
      resize in interface com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
      Overrides:
      resize in class com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
      Parameters:
      width - New screen width.
      height - New screen height.

    • dispose

      public void dispose()
      Called when the screen needs to dispose resources. Must be overridden by child classes if they create other LibGDX objects.
      Specified by:
      dispose in interface com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
      Overrides:
      dispose in class com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
